mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, REPLY_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{replyContent}, #{refBno}, #{replyWriter} )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REF_BNO, NICK_NAME AS REPLY_WRITER, R.CREATE_DATE, R.STATUS, USER_NO FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON R.REPLY_WRITER = M.USER_NO WHERE REF_BNO = #{bno} AND R.STATUS='Y'
